summary: I Simply turned  Halted stream camp into a fully functional player home.
descriptionHtml:
PLEASE READ!

I Turned Halted stream camp into a starter player home. Fully equipped with enchanting table and alchemy table, workbench, grindstone, tanning rack, and smithy. It also includes 5 non respawning chests and starter gear on the table.

IF YOU WANT A CAMP OF YOUR CHOICE CONVERTED INTO A PLAYER HOME JUST POST AND LET ME KNOW. :D

IMPORTANT NOTE
As this is a work in progress i deleted the bandits later i will instead move them to a different location. So if you like doing bounty side quests this isn\'t for you.

This is my first mod so if there are blood decals on the ground i apologize. I set the chests to non respawning so if they do respawn im sorry. Let me know of any issues and i will try my best to fix it.
There may be random stuff in the chests just take it out. And i couldnt figure out how to get rid of the bodies in the pit area. ( Just disable them Ill try my best to get rid of them.)
author: Darkness9653
